detail_desc: Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with a reversible sequin motif on the front, part of which is glow-in-the-dark.
Fitted vest top in ribbed jersey. Narrow cut at the top.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, patterned fleece that fasten down the front and along one leg. Ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with twisted side seams and short raglan sleeves.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a high waist and wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Sculpting seams at the back that showcase the body’s physique. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Fully lined swimsuit with a decorative zip at the top and round neck front and back.
Jacket in soft faux fur with a notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front and side pockets. Lined.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
3/4-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a waist panel.
Bibs in soft cotton jersey with a terry back and press-stud fastening.
Fitted top in jersey with a transparent mesh yoke and sleeves, and a cut-out opening at the top.
Fitted top in cotton jersey with a V-neck and short sleeves.

Set with a long-sleeved jumper and pair of trousers in a soft jacquard knit. Jumper with a roll edge neckline, decorative bow at the top, buttons on one shoulder and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated waist.
Satin blouse with a grandad collar, concealed buttons down the front, yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Long sleeves with wide cuffs with covered buttons.
Jersey-lined cargo trousers in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly with a press-stud. Front pockets, a fake back pocket with a flap and flap leg pockets.
Straight-style jumper in a knit made partly from recycled polyester with a rib-knit polo neck. Dropped shoulders, ribbing at the cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Twill cap with an appliqué on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Fully lined bikini top with laser-cut edges and underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Sleeveless dress in organic cotton jersey with a gathered seam and wide flounce at the hem.
Top in satin with lace details, narrow shoulder straps and a deep V-neck front and back.
Ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch twill with a high waist, zip fly and button, back pockets and skinny legs with stripes down the sides.
Treggings in stretch corduroy with an adjustable elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Ballet pumps in imitation leather with a glittery finish. Elastic strap over the foot and elastic gores in the sides. Satin linings and insoles and soft imitation suede soles.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton jersey with a collar, button placket and slits in the sides.
Shopper in supple imitation leather with two handles and a magnetic fastener at the top. Unlined. Size 17x28x32.5 cm.

Shorts in a linen and cotton blend with concealed, adjustable elastication and a drawstring at the waist and a zip fly and press-stud. Diagonal front pockets, welt back pockets and a small fabric appliqué at the hem of one leg.
Hair elastic decorated with a large bow.
Nightslip in soft jersey with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a lace detail at the back of the neck. Triangular lace cups with removable inserts and a lace trim under the bust.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, a lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Leather belt with a metal buckle. Width 2.8 cm.
Slim-fit trousers in washed, stretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Set with a jacket and pair of trousers in soft, thermal fleece. Jacket with a stand-up collar, zip down the front, chin guard, long raglan sleeves and contrasting colour trims at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated waist and trim at the hems.

Boxy, oversized jacket in a soft wool blend with a brushed finish. Collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat and hanger loop at the back. Concealed chest pockets with a flap and open patch pockets with a decorative flap at the front. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Slim-fit trousers in washed, superstretch twill with hard-worn details, front and back pockets and narrow, raw-edge, frayed hems.
Elastic scrunchies in an airy weave.

Cardigan in soft pile with glittery details, a small embroidered detail at the top and a small stand-up collar. Zip down the front with a chin guard and heart-shaped tab, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Tops in soft cotton jersey with a racer back and visible elastication at the hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Lined hood with a wrapover front that has decorative eyelets, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Biker jacket in imitation leather with a diagonal zip at the front, side pockets and ribbed jersey sections under the arms. Lined.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with side pockets and wide elastication with a drawstring at the waist. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.
T-shirt in slub cotton jersey with sewn-in turn-ups at the sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Biker jacket in washed stretch twill with hard worn details and notch lapels with decorative buttons. Diagonal zip at the front, zipped side pockets and a zip at the cuffs. Unlined.
Fully lined bandeau bikini top with padded cups and removable inserts. Detachable ties at the back of the neck, ties at the back, side support and a silicone trim at the top.
Dress in soft sweatshirt fabric with a glittery print on the front, long raglan sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Gloves in soft, supple leather. Lined.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.
Sun hat in a soft cotton weave with ties under the chin. Lined. Width of brim 4 cm.

Ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a regular waist. Wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist and with a concealed key pocket. The polyester content of the tights is partly recycled.
Crop tops in soft cotton jersey with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and an elasticated hem.

Stylish coat woven in a wool blend with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Fastening with three buttons at the front, a chest pocket, diagonal welt pockets at the sides and two inner pockets, one at each side. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. The wool content of the coat and the polyester content of the lining are recycled.
Leather belt with a metal buckle. Width 3.5 cm.
Bolero in fine-knit, hole-patterned cotton with a button at the neck and long sleeves.
Gently tailored shirt in a stretch cotton blend with a turn-down collar, V-neck, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist and discreet pockets in the side seams.
Hat and scarf set in a soft rib knit. Hat with a turned-up hem. Size of scarf 25x175 cm.
Long-sleeved, all-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Short-sleeved tops in organic cotton jersey with a round neckline.
Long-sleeved top in soft, patterned sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with fringe details, a round neckline with an opening and ties at front and short, smock-trimmed puff sleeves.
Chunky-soled trainers with a padded top edge and a tongue and lacing at the front. Leather linings and insoles.
Leggings in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and flared legs.
Thong briefs in cotton jersey with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back. Wide elastic waistband.
Push-up bra in lace and mesh with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Hooded jacket in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front, side pockets and ribbed cuffs. Brushed inside.

Blouse in a crêpe weave with a pleated stand-up collar that has a decorative knot detail at the front, an opening at the top and a concealed zip at the back. Long sleeves with covered buttons at the cuffs.

Ankle-length suit trousers in a stretch weave with a zip fly, hook-and-eye fastener and concealed button. Side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Patterned swimsuit with a frill at the top and on the shoulder straps, and a small bow at the back. Lined gusset.

Short sleeveless dress in soft slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a V-neck front and back and sewn-in wrapover front. Seam at the waist with a gently flared skirt and sewn-in ties. Unlined.
Lightly padded captain’s cap in twill with a slight sheen. Decorative cord and metal buttons at the front. Cotton lining.
Sleeveless dress in printed jersey with a seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Slim-fit, high-waisted jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Trousers in wide-wale organic cotton corduroy with a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hem.
Cardigan knitted in a soft cotton blend with a shawl collar, off-centre zip down the front and long sleeves.
Scarf in a softly draping, patterned weave that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 55x55 cm.
Short, wide top in imitation leather with lacing down the back and short sleeves.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit wool blend with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Calf-length, pleated skirt in a shimmering metallic weave. High waist with covered elastication. Unlined.
